title: 321. Andy & DJ CTI: Crickets For Human Consumption, Nancy Pelosi Pushing Daughter Of GOP Rep. & Clarence Thomas Called The 'N-Word'
itunes:title: 321. Andy & DJ CTI: Crickets For Human Consumption, Nancy Pelosi Pushing Daughter Of GOP Rep. & Clarence Thomas Called The 'N-Word'
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss a Canadian Plant that plans to produce nearly 10 tons of crickets for human consumption, Nancy Pelosi pushing the daughter of GOP Rep. Mayra Flores during a photo op, and racist white progressives openly calling Clarence Thomas the "N-word."
